divs: sighting detailsit looked just like the one described by the jal pilot years ago, giant cigar shape with one bright light below it "not a beam" moving at great velocity i saw its shape as it moved through the fog bank off the coast, it was huge! the light flashed randomly before it "left earth at hyper sonic speeds! it moved from the left "east" carmel valley towards the ocean, it moved back\forth a few jogs before the light flashed a random pattern then it left through the fog at super speeds!
Summary: {dr}large bright light over carmel valley moving through fog towards the ocean at very high rate of speed pulsating random giant cigar shape at twilight
Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Carmel
There were no other sightings in Carmel on or around October 3rd 2012
